content.question: Three common methods employed in the cleanup of oil spills are

choices.label: aeration of water, skimmer boats, and genetically engineered bacteria
aeration of water, phytoremediation, and genetically engineered bacteria
skimmer boats, high temperature incineration, and phytoremediation
large floating booms, high temperature incineration, and phytoremediation
large floating booms, skimmer boats, and genetically engineered bacteria

content.answer: large floating booms, skimmer boats, and genetically engineered bacteria

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Describe potential responses or approaches to environmental problems.
